title: GroceryStoreHamiltonData-vignette
text: sf package used handle vector spatial data.
code: library(GroceryStoreHamiltonData) library(sf) #> Linking to GEOS 3.12.1, GDAL 3.8.4, PROJ 9.3.1; sf_use_s2() is TRUE

title: GroceryStoreHamiltonData-vignette
text: Load plot grocery_DA vector data. dataset contains geometry census tracts Hamilton includes two variables: population count 2021 grocery store counts census tract.
code: data("grocery_DA") plot(grocery_DA[ ,"v_CA21_1..Population..2021"],      main = "2021 Population Count") plot(grocery_DA[ ,"Freq"],      main = "Grocery Store Count")

what: An OLS simple linear regression of these two variables
title: GroceryStoreHamiltonData-vignette
text: Based simple regression (p-value = 0.06 > 0.05), population count significant predictor grocery store count Hamilton.
code: lm1 <- lm(Freq ~ v_CA21_1..Population..2021, data = grocery_DA) summary(lm1) #>  #> Call: #> lm(formula = Freq ~ v_CA21_1..Population..2021, data = grocery_DA) #>  #> Residuals: #>     Min      1Q  Median      3Q     Max  #> -0.4473 -0.0986 -0.0917 -0.0872  3.8979  #>  #> Coefficients: #>                             Estimate Std. Error t value Pr(>|t|)    #> (Intercept)                6.691e-02  2.135e-02   3.134  0.00178 ** #> v_CA21_1..Population..2021 4.985e-05  2.669e-05   1.868  0.06211 .  #> --- #> Signif. codes:  0 '***' 0.001 '**' 0.01 '*' 0.05 '.' 0.1 ' ' 1 #>  #> Residual standard error: 0.3836 on 889 degrees of freedom #> Multiple R-squared:  0.003909,   Adjusted R-squared:  0.002789  #> F-statistic: 3.489 on 1 and 889 DF,  p-value: 0.06211

title: Authors and Citation
text: Zehui Yin. Author, maintainer.

title: Authors and Citation
text: Yin Z (2024). GroceryStoreHamiltonData: Data paper "Food Deserts Food Oases? Predicting Grocery Store Locations Hamilton, Ontario". R package version 1.0, https://zehuiyin.github.io/GroceryStoreHamiltonData/, https://github.com/zehuiyin/GroceryStoreHamiltonData.
code: @Manual{,   title = {GroceryStoreHamiltonData: Data for the paper "Food Deserts or Food Oases? Predicting Grocery Store Locations in Hamilton, Ontario"},   author = {Zehui Yin},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 1.0, https://zehuiyin.github.io/GroceryStoreHamiltonData/},   url = {https://github.com/zehuiyin/GroceryStoreHamiltonData}, }

title: Data for the paper
text: package activity completed Zehui Yin course GEOG 712 Reproducible Research Workflow GitHub R, taught Dr. Antonio Paez Fall 2024. includes data paper titled “Food Deserts Food Oases? Predicting Grocery Store Locations Hamilton, Ontario,” final project course.

title: Data for the paper
text: can install development version GroceryStoreHamiltonData GitHub :

title: Data for the paper
text: basic example shows solve common problem: Load plot grocery_CT vector data. dataset includes geYometry census tracts Hamilton contains variable shows count grocery stores census tract.
code: library(GroceryStoreHamiltonData) data("grocery_DA") hist(grocery_DA$Freq,      main = "Grocery Store Count of Census Dissemination Area in Hamilton",      xlab = "Grocery Store Count")

title: Data for the paper
text: Yin, Z. (2024). GroceryStoreHamiltonData: Data paper “Food Deserts Food Oases? Predicting Grocery Store Locations Hamilton, Ontario”. https://github.com/zehuiyin/GroceryStoreHamiltonData
code: @Manual{GroceryStoreHamiltonData,   title = {GroceryStoreHamiltonData: Data for the paper "Food Deserts or Food Oases? Predicting Grocery Store Locations in Hamilton, Ontario"},   author = {Zehui Yin},   year = {2024},   note = {R package version 1.0},   url = {https://github.com/zehuiyin/GroceryStoreHamiltonData} }

title: Data Source Information — data_source
text: dataframe containing information raw data package

title: Data Source Information — data_source
text: dataframe 3 columns: Name Data Name: name dataset. URL Source (URL): link data downloaded. Date Accessed Date: date data downloaded.

title: Data Source Information — data_source
code: data(data_source) summary(data_source) #>      Name               URL                 Date            #>  Length:4           Length:4           Min.   :2024-10-04   #>  Class :character   Class :character   1st Qu.:2024-10-04   #>  Mode  :character   Mode  :character   Median :2024-10-04   #>                                        Mean   :2024-10-14   #>                                        3rd Qu.:2024-10-14   #>                                        Max.   :2024-11-16   head(data_source) #>                             Name #> 1                grocery.geojson #> 2           fall2024_GTFS_static #> 3 ontario_latest_cropped.osm.pbf #> 4            hamilton_DA.geojson #>                                                               URL       Date #> 1                            https://overpass-turbo.eu/index.html 2024-10-04 #> 2                       https://opendata.hamilton.ca/GTFS-Static/ 2024-10-04 #> 3 https://download.geofabrik.de/north-america/canada/ontario.html 2024-10-04 #> 4                                     https://censusmapper.ca/api 2024-11-16

what: Grocery Stores in Census Dissemination Area in Hamilton — grocery_DA

title: Prepare data for analysis — prepare_data
text: function aggregates grocery store counts computes additional variables based raw census data. function require arguments require internet access.

title: Prepare data for analysis — prepare_data
text: sf dataframe 49 columns, additional columns compared raw grocery_DA: hsr_level quantile level transit stop number census DA (high, mid, low) n_hsr_stops transit stop number census DA n_hsr_stops_density transit stop density per square kilometres census DA pop_density Population density per square kilometres log_pop_density Natural log population density per square kilometres plus 1 log_area Natural log land area square kilometres dist_to_downtown Euclidean distance census DA centroid Hamilton downton metres log_dist_to_downtown Natural log Euclidean distance census DA centroid Hamilton downton metres PCT_aged_under_24 Percentage residents aged 24 years old PCT_aged_above_65 Percentage residents aged 65 years old PCT_single_detached Percentage residents living single detached houses PCT_married_common_law Percentage residents married living common law PCT_income_less_40k Percentage residents household income less 40k PCT_income_greater_100k Percentage residents household income greater 100k PCT_dont_know_official_language Percentage residents know/speak official languages PCT_not_speak_offcial_language_at_home Percentage residents speak official languages home

title: Prepare data for analysis — prepare_data
text: data frame based grocery_DA additional variables

title: Prepare data for analysis — prepare_data
text: Zehui Yin, yinz39@mcmaster.ca

title: Prepare data for analysis — prepare_data
code: grocery_DA <- prepare_data() summary(grocery_DA[,c("Freq", "PCT_single_detached")]) #>       Freq         PCT_single_detached          geometry   #>  Min.   :0.00000   Min.   :  0.00      MULTIPOLYGON :891   #>  1st Qu.:0.00000   1st Qu.: 37.86      epsg:26917   :  0   #>  Median :0.00000   Median : 72.44      +proj=utm ...:  0   #>  Mean   :0.09877   Mean   : 63.79                          #>  3rd Qu.:0.00000   3rd Qu.: 93.94                          #>  Max.   :4.00000   Max.   :104.17                          #>                    NA's   :4
